content.text:
Template Editor is a drag and drop application to assist you with building rich and advanced layouts for all manor of resolutions!

With Template Editor you can easily create templates to use for documents, web articles or even adverts.
Design and build web applications using only your web browser!

Template Editor allows you to set almost all standardized CSS3 settings on any element with ease!

Simply select an element, configure its visual properties in the Property Pane and see your changes in real time.

TemplateEngine comes with built in Responsive Design features, allowing you to easily and visually design and build your applications for any resolution.

With Template Editor you can start creating your layout in any resolution first and add more later on. You don't have to go Mobile-First.
COPYRIGHT (©) 2014 by COMPANY-NAME. All rights reserved.
Contact us: E-mail - Twitter - Facebook
Template Editor supports click, drag and drop actions allowing you to quickly place, move and scale elements.
